mapper.insert: insert into clbx (cbxid, carid, empno, gsid, cusid, bxdh, bxdate, bxstate, bxnum, tbdate, dbdate) values (#{cbxid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bxdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bxstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bxnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tbdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dbdate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update clbx set carid = #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, empno = #{empno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gsid = #{gsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cusid = #{cusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bxdh = #{bxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bxdate = #{bxdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bxstate = #{bxstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bxnum = #{bxnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tbdate = #{tbdate,jdbcType=DATE}, dbdate = #{dbdate,jdbcType=DATE} where cbxid = #{cbxid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cbxid, carid, empno, gsid, cusid, bxdh, bxdate, bxstate, bxnum, tbdate, dbdate from clbx
